books.title: The Incredulity of Father Brown
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: The third set of stories of a Catholic priest who is also an amateur detective.

books.title: Ashenden
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A collection of short stories based on the experiences of an intelligence agent during World War I.

books.title: Personal Memoirs of Ulysses S. Grant
books.author: Ulysses S. Grant
books.summary: One of the greatest generals of the United States tells the story of his life and details his key role in winning the Civil War.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: The Water-Babies
books.author: Charles Kingsley
books.summary: A young, uneducated, and mistreated chimney sweep is reborn as a denizen of the fairy world, beginning a journey of moral and spiritual growth.

books.title: You Never Can Tell
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: A family recently returned to England navigates a comedy of errors when they accidentally meet their estranged husband and unknown father.

books.title: Cymbeline
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A British princess marries a poor gentleman against her father the King’s wishes.

books.title: The Book of Wonder
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A collection of fantastical short stories.

books.title: Framley Parsonage
books.author: Anthony Trollope
books.summary: A young vicar with an aristocratic patron foolishly becomes mired in debt.

books.title: The Return
books.author: Walter de la Mare
books.summary: After visiting a graveyard, a man finds his appearance has mysteriously changed.

books.title: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
books.author: T. E. Lawrence
books.summary: T. E. Lawrence’s memoir of leading the Arab revolt against the Ottoman empire during World War I.

books.title: The Jade God
books.author: Alan Sullivan
books.summary: Two years after a mysterious murder, a brother and sister move into a countryside manor and begin to notice strange occurrences.

books.title: Aspects of the Novel
books.author: E. M. Forster
books.summary: E. M. Forster offers an analysis of aspects of the novel.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Errico Malatesta
books.summary: A collection of essays by Errico Malatesta.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: William Carlos Williams
books.summary: An anthology of William Carlos Williams’ poetry collections, combining The Tempers (1913), Al Que Quiere! (1917), and Sour Grapes (1921).

books.title: The Importance of Being Earnest
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A comedy skewering Victorian high society.

books.title: We
books.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin
books.summary: A thousand years in the future, the builder of a spaceship discovers his emotions.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Selma Lagerlöf
books.summary: A collection of Selma Lagerlöf’s translated short stories, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: The Pilgrim’s Progress
books.author: John Bunyan
books.summary: An allegorical story of a pilgrim in search of redemption, followed later by his wife and children, passing through great trials before reaching the Celestial City.

books.title: Through the Brazilian Wilderness
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: Theodore Roosevelt’s autobiographical account of his expedition into the uncharted depths of the Brazilian rainforest.
